## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a80797432aad825151adf407bf1a7df167013faed787f2530a93f1736f2a0084)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cds-banking-prd-viewer' @ 99.3.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
